tasks.task_description: Examine DimABSA data format and DESS data format examples
Create convert_dimabsa_to_dess.py script with tokenization and span finding
Add POS tagging and dependency parsing using spaCy
Convert training and dev datasets for English restaurant

description: Phase 1: Data Conversion - Convert DimABSA JSONL to DESS JSON format
context:
Examined data formats:
- DimABSA: JSONL with ID, Text, Quadruplet/Triplet (Aspect, Opinion, VA as "V.VV#A.AA")
- DESS: JSON array with tokens, entities (type/start/end), sentiments (type/head/tail), pos, dependency
- Key difference: DimABSA uses text spans, DESS uses token indices
- Need to tokenize, find spans, add POS/dependency, convert VA format

Created convert_dimabsa_to_dess.py with:
- Tokenization using spaCy
- Token span finding for aspects/opinions
- POS tagging and dependency parsing
- VA score preservation as string format
- Handles both Triplet and Quadruplet fields

Phase 1 Complete! Successfully:
- Created convert_dimabsa_to_dess.py script
- Tested on sample data - working correctly
- Converted training data: 1,448 samples
- Converted test data: 200 samples
- All data in DESS/Codebase/data/dimabsa_eng_restaurant/
- VA scores preserved as strings (e.g., "7.83#8.00")
- Ready for Phase 2: Model Modification
